about: Hello! I love finding, recording, making, reproducing and creating sounds! If you wish to use my sounds, please credit me as "giddster" and link to my Freesound page. If you want to work with me in any capacity, comission sounds or just have a chat, please e-mail me at giddsterscorner@gmail.com or PM me here. Requests and ideas are always appreciated too! My gear: Microphones: RØDE NT2-A, RØDE M3, RØDE NT3, AKG D5S Field mic: Zoom H1 Cheers and have a nice day! I also make music, some of which you can find on Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/artist/3j7HT2vM1KsyH8ICdJP6lI?si=dOwp7s2gQx2GRfpgRbLvWA P.S. The comment system on Freesound is a pain in the ass, so I can't seem to reply properly... just know that every comment is appreciated and reading what you might use my sounds for is fantastic!
